contractObjectiveList.description: Attack the Installation and paint the area for a Fire Mission
contractObjectiveList.title: Secure the Facility and Designate the Fire Mission Target

dialogueContent.words: They really want to hold on to that technology. It is a shame we have to blow them up.
Commander, to fire this orbital weapon, we're going to need precise targeting. A glancing shot won't penetrate the bunker and reach the Lost Tech.
You'll need to move your 'Mechs up to place beacons in three positions around the bunker. I would try jumping between beacon locations to keep your evasion up.

The Blake cannot stay in orbit for very long, Commander; the Local Government will certainly wonder why a ComStar DropShip is loitering around their planet. That means there is an time constraint on your operation.
Don't leave the Pwwka in the firing zone, that is 100 million C-Bills of scrap if you do.
Once the bunker is destroyed, move your people to the evacuation zone, where I've arranged a Leopard pickup.
Amazing, I will see that these are put into production right away. We need some new tools to deal with outside threats.
I guess I shouldn't have expected as much from your team.
Observer Actual, this is Blake Actual. We have your target designation. Making our run now.
Observer Actual, this is Blake Actual. Approaching target in 30.
Alpha beacon deployed, Commander. Good work.
Bravo beacon deployed, Commander.
Charlie beacon deployed.
We are taking fire, Quickly secure the Tech!
All units, close distance on enemy forces. We have to disrupt those beacons!
Fire Control this is Observer Actual: Good effect on target. Targets Destroyed.
Unknown mercenary commander: This is your last warning. We will not tolerate this intrusion into our territory.
Our elite guard is touching down now. Withdraw or you will be destroyed.
We are not holding up well.
Commander, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces on station. I guess you needed our help after all.
We'll work in parallel to you and eliminate any opposition we come into contact with.
We're finished, Commander. You're on your own again.
Commander it looks like these Locals have hired some big guns, Be careful.
Expect Mercenary Reinforcements shortly.
Hmmm. Commander, the Locals seem to have a subterranean motor pool, and they're deploying armed vehicles from it.
It's part of the hardened bunker, and we can't disable it until the orbital strike completes. So, I suggest moving quickly.

Commander, If you don't get that target painted for them, they'll miss their opportunity to take a shot. The Locals have already scrambled their orbital defenses; we will not get a second chance at this.
Commander, my sensors show a large incoming enemy reaction force. Head to Evac.
We're holding here for our own reinforcements. Get to your evac point and go! We'll cover you.
CHECK FIRE! CHECK FIRE! FRIENDLIES NOT CLEAR OF IMPACT SITE. OH---
Warning: Incoming artillery fire.

longDescription: I Don't like the sound of this.

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Alpha for Fire Mission Designation

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Bravo for Fire Mission Designation

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Charlie for Fire Mission Designation
Get Visual Confirmation of the Fire Mission's Effect
Extract before Additional Enemy Reinforcements Arrive

objectiveList.description: If you Destory the Air Defense unit on the base for reinforcements.
objectiveList.title: Defeat the Enemy Air Defense

shortDescription: Commander, I had a bet with Precenter Erroden that you couldn't blow up a base with just 4 30 ton mechs. He didn't say I couldn't use a Naval PPC though. We have almost convinced the Powers that be, that this mech is viable at it's steep production cost. Lets show him how it's done.
